sentences.en: " I got some lard, " he would add, as an afterthought.
sentences.cn: “ 我买了一些猪油, " 他会补充说, 像是又想起来了.

sentences.en: Almost as an afterthought he added that he missed her.
sentences.cn: 他又几乎不假思索地补充说他想念她。

sentences.en: Almost as an afterthought, he mentioned that it might do something for the planet.
sentences.cn: 后来, 他还提到这个预算的通过对整个星球都是有好处的.

sentences.en: Don't make finding an agent an afterthought.
sentences.cn: 不要找代理人事后的想法.

sentences.en: He added as an afterthought, ‘Bring Melanie too.'
sentences.cn: 他想了想又说道: “把梅拉妮也带来。”

sentences.en: He knew she had accepted without afterthought.
sentences.cn: 他知道她未经思考就欣然接受邀请.

sentences.en: It used to be that software testing was an afterthought.
sentences.cn: 以前人们通常认为软件测试只是事后诸葛.

sentences.en: It was B. B.'s idea originally, of course,'he added as an afterthought.
sentences.cn: 当然啦,起初这是B. B. 的主意, ” 他转念一想,又加了一句.

sentences.en: Maybe it is the suspect who was trying to destroy any evidence as an afterthought.
sentences.cn: 也许这是嫌疑犯在事后考虑之后,企图毁灭证据.

sentences.en: The afterthought is good, But forethought is Better.
sentences.cn: 事后回想有益, 事前考虑更佳.

sentences.en: The film was made first and the music was added as an afterthought.
sentences.cn: 这部电影是先拍摄画面的,音乐是后加上的.
那个车库是后来的想法.

sentences.en: They had only added that to the form as an afterthought.
sentences.cn: 他们仅把这作为补充加在了表格上.

sentences.en: They only invited Jack and Sarah as an afterthought .
sentences.cn: 他们邀请杰克和萨拉不过是事后想起的补救办法。

sentences.en: You could see that the last part of the report had just been graftedas an afterthought.
sentences.cn: 你可以看出,这报告的最后部份是事后想起才移花接木的.

sentences.en: You know, that painting has a sad story, he added a moment later, as an afterthought.
sentences.cn: 你知道么, 关于那幅画还有个伤心的故事,之后, 他加了一句,似乎若有所思.

trans.tran_cn: 事后的考虑或想法，事后聪明，事后再想起，后来添加的东西
trans.tran_en: something that you mention or add later because you did not think of it or plan it before
